apis.description: This endpoint provides statistics for all quiz versions, or for a specific quiz version, in which case the output is guaranteed to represent the _latest_ and most current version of the quiz. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

operations.notes: This endpoint provides statistics for all quiz versions, or for a specific quiz version, in which case the output is guaranteed to represent the _latest_ and most current version of the quiz. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

parameters.name: all_versions
parameters.description: Whether the statistics report should include all submissions attempts.

id.description: The ID of the quiz statistics report.

quiz_id.description:
The ID of the Quiz the statistics report is for. 
NOTE: AVAILABLE ONLY IN NON-JSON-API REQUESTS.

multiple_attempts_exist.description: Whether there are any students that have made mutliple submissions for this quiz.

includes_all_versions.description: In the presence of multiple attempts, this field describes whether the statistics describe all the submission attempts and not only the latest ones.

generated_at.description: The time at which the statistics were generated, which is usually after the occurrence of a quiz event, like a student submitting it.

url.description: The API HTTP/HTTPS URL to this quiz statistics.

html_url.description: The HTTP/HTTPS URL to the page where the statistics can be seen visually.

question_statistics.description: Question-specific statistics for each question and its answers.

submission_statistics.description: Question-specific statistics for each question and its answers.

links.description:
JSON-API construct that contains links to media related to this quiz statistics object. 
NOTE: AVAILABLE ONLY IN JSON-API REQUESTS.

QuizStatisticsLinks.description: Links to media related to QuizStatistics.

quiz.description: HTTP/HTTPS API URL to the quiz this statistics describe.

QuizStatisticsQuestionStatistics.description: Statistics for submissions made to a specific quiz question.

responses.description: Number of students who have provided an answer to this question. Blank or empty responses are not counted.

answers.description: Statistics related to each individual pre-defined answer.

QuizStatisticsAnswerStatistics.description: Statistics for a specific pre-defined answer in a Multiple-Choice or True/False quiz question.

text.description: The text attached to the answer.

weight.description: An integer to determine correctness of the answer. Incorrect answers should be 0, correct answers should be non-negative.

responses.description: Number of students who have chosen this answer.

QuizStatisticsAnswerPointBiserial.description: A point-biserial construct for a single pre-defined answer in a Multiple-Choice or True/False question.

answer_id.description: ID of the answer the point biserial is for.

point_biserial.description: The point biserial value for this answer. Value ranges between -1 and 1.

correct.description: Convenience attribute that denotes whether this is the correct answer as opposed to being a distractor. This is mutually exclusive with the `distractor` value

distractor.description: Convenience attribute that denotes whether this is a distractor answer and not the correct one. This is mutually exclusive with the `correct` value

QuizStatisticsSubmissionStatistics.description: Generic statistics for all submissions for a quiz.

unique_count.description: The number of students who have taken the quiz.

score_average.description: The mean of the student submission scores.

score_stdev.description: Standard deviation of the submission scores.

scores.description: A percentile distribution of the student scores, each key is the percentile (ranges between 0 and 100%) while the value is the number of students who received that score.

correct_count_average.description: The mean of the number of questions answered correctly by each student.

incorrect_count_average.description: The mean of the number of questions answered incorrectly by each student.

duration_average.description: The average time spent by students while taking the quiz.
